com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget
Class SmartRelativeLayout

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.RelativeLayout
              com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget.SmartRelativeLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
public class SmartRelativeLayout
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout

Introduced in order to get notified when a container size changes, because there is no OnSizeChangedListener in Android View, whereas there is a View#onSizeChanged() method.

Use this wrapper container every time you need to be notified when a widget sizes changes.

Since:
2011.04.01
Author:
É‰douard Mercier
See Also:
SmartFrameLayout

Nested Class Summary
static interface SmartRelativeLayout.OnSizeChangedListener
          The single interface method will be invoked every time its underlying size changes.
